posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bruce Kasarda
All sold. Thanks to everyone. My boats name is N1724U.



I will be selling about 200 Old Judges till they are all gone starting today. I am keeping all the hall of famers and those that may make it someday. I am also keeping all the managers and catalog listed two player cards. If you are looking for some tough Old Judges, I might have them. If your looking for a cheap old judge, try the flea market.I have decided to make this heart breaking decision because I need a new cabin cruiser for retirement. One warning, you may become addicted to Old Judges if you buy some, truly the most outstanding set. thanks bruce kasarda

Hey Bruce, I got the Silver King card today and I love it. The card is in way better shape then I imagined and I am pleasantly surprised especially for purchasing it sight unseen and going off your description. Thanks again and I will let you know about the rest of the cards I inquired about.
